root.name: Alpine Racer 2
root.description: OverviewAlpine Racer 2 is a skiing game developed and published by Namco for the arcade platform. Instead of a typical joystick and buttons for control the player would stand on a board which was meant to simulate using real skis.GameplayThe gameplay mechanics of Alpine Racer 2 consist of the player physically standing on the machine and moving back and forth, simulating skiing.There are three different game mode types that can be selected:RacingFree SkiingMogulIn the racing mode there are also two different sub selections which are: Speed Racing and Gate Racing.
